c610455d-d689-4a6c-a68f-93f5d81a2e3b.description: Earners of the Azure Purview Partner Accelerator Workshop badge participated in team-based challenges centred around the Azure Purview service. Activities included account creation, registering, and scanning a data source, searching and browsing the catalogue, populating the glossary and assigning terms, creating and applying custom classifications, understanding lineage and insights, monitoring resources, integrating with Azure Synapse Analytics, and getting started with the Apache Atlas API.
c610455d-d689-4a6c-a68f-93f5d81a2e3b.name: Azure Purview Partner Accelerator Workshop

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Global Partner Solutions (GPS)

badge_template_activities.title: Participants worked as part of a virtual team to complete the minimum set of challenges presented to them as per the Azure Purview lab guide. This involved the provisioning of a fictional data estate, with sources registered and scanned into an Azure Purview account, populating the underlying data catalogue, then subsequently enriching the catalogue with glossary terms, classifications, insights, and more.

The objective of this workshop was for participants to get hands-on with the Azure Purview service and understand key concepts as teams collectively worked through the various modules (Register & Scan, Glossary, Classifications, Lineage, Insights, Monitoring, Integration with Synapse Analytics, and the REST API).
Participants demonstrated foundational-level knowledge on Azure Purview by completing the minimum set of modules and associated knowledge checks at the end of each exercise.
